page.title: 07THE SEWAGE PLANT
page.content: {THE SEWAGE PLANT { The sewage plant is a place were the sewage from the loo goes.In the olden days they used to throw it out of the window and said,"GARDY LOO" and if you happened to be below you did not look up.You see they did not have indoor toilets so they had to do it in a basin and threw it out the window because the drains were in the middle of the street. Nowadays you just flush the toilet and thats the end of it.Sometimes a big sewage lorry comes and collects it all in its tank its just like a petrol tanker.And it takes it to the sewage plant and they treat it so it cant harm sea life. It is then pumped onto a ship called the 'Gardy Loo', and dumped out at the edge of the North Sea.
